-sc_threshold.explanation: Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default -1)

-skip_threshold.explanation: Frame skip threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-skip_exp.explanation: Frame skip exponent (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-skip_cmp.explanation: Frame skip compare function (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default dctmax)

satd.explanation: Sum of absolute Hadamard transformed differences

dct.explanation: Sum of absolute DCT transformed differences

psnr.explanation: Sum of squared quantization errors, low quality

bit.explanation: Number of bits needed for the block

nsse.explanation: Noise preserving sum of squared differences

msad.explanation: Sum of absolute differences, median predicted

-sc_threshold.explanation: Scene change threshold (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-mpeg_quant.explanation: Use MPEG quantizers instead of H.263 (from 0 to 1) (default 0)

-ps.explanation: RTP payload size in bytes (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-mepc.explanation: Motion estimation bitrate penalty compensation (1.0 = 256) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 256)

-mepre.explanation: pre motion estimation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-intra_penalty.explanation: Penalty for intra blocks in block decision (from 0 to 1.07374e+09) (default 0)

-a53cc.explanation: Use A53 Closed Captions (if available) (default true)

-gop_timecode.explanation: MPEG GOP Timecode in hh:mm:ss[:;.]ff format. Overrides timecode_frame_start.

-drop_frame_timecode.explanation: Timecode is in drop frame format. (default false)

-scan_offset.explanation: Reserve space for SVCD scan offset user data. (default false)

-timecode_frame_start.explanation: GOP timecode frame start number, in non-drop-frame format (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

-mpv_flags.explanation: Flags common for all mpegvideo-based encoders. (default 0)

skip_rd.explanation: RD optimal MB level residual skipping

qp_rd.explanation: Use rate distortion optimization for qp selection

cbp_rd.explanation: use rate distortion optimization for CBP

mv0.explanation: always try a mb with mv=<0,0>

-luma_elim_threshold.explanation: single coefficient elimination threshold for luminance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-chroma_elim_threshold.explanation: single coefficient elimination threshold for chrominance (negative values also consider dc coefficient) (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-error_rate.explanation: Simulate errors in the bitstream to test error concealment. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-qsquish.explanation: how to keep quantizer between qmin and qmax (0 = clip, 1 = use differentiable function) (from 0 to 99) (default 0)

-rc_qmod_freq.explanation: experimental quantizer modulation (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 0)

-rc_eq.explanation: Set rate control equation. When computing the expression, besides the standard functions defined in the section 'Expression Evaluation', the following functions are available: bits2qp(bits), qp2bits(qp). Also the following constants are available: iTex pTex tex mv fCode iCount mcVar var isI isP isB avgQP qComp avgIITex avgPITex avgPPTex avgBPTex avgTex.

-pbias.explanation: inter quant bias (from INT_MIN to INT_MAX) (default 999999)
